pullRequest.title: Use CacheableTaskQueue for state generation and caching
pullRequest.bodyText:
PR Description
Follow on PR from #2628 that moves state generation over to use CacheableTaskQueue replacing StateGenerationQueue.  Removes duplicate code and closes a small gap between checking the state cache and starting regeneration which could result in recreating a state that had just finished being recreated.
Documentation

 I thought about documentation and added the documentation label to this PR if updates are required.
